Plot: Drama featuring an irreverent group of 6 girls and guys in their mid-20s, who share the same apartment building - and the same 'Super Pub', named 'The Big Bow Wow'.
Title: The Big Bow Wow
Writer: Trevor J. Colgan, Gerry Gregg, Eoghan Harris, David Blake Knox, Tim Palmer
Actors: Risteard Cooper, Lisa Dwan, Sara James, Michael Legge
